alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Leavenworth; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 3:19AM CDT until April 20 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Wyandotte County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Johnson County in east central Kansas... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Lawrence, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Tonganoxie, Basehor, Edwardsville, Kansas City, Linwood, Reno, Fairmount, Clearview City, Jarbalo and Piper. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 412. Interstate 435 between mile markers 9 and 13. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 226. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
